Feb. 24, 2013 D Oxfordshire & District Brass Band Association Winter Contest (Open Section)

Marlborough School, Woodstock, Oxfordshire, England, UK For championship and 1st section bands.

Best Bass Section of the Day: Kidlington Concert Brass (Aine Jackson, James Longstaffe, John Underwood, Kevin Hopkins) Most Under 19 Players of the Day: Yarnton (Section C)
